exchange.description: The stock exchange where the company is listed (e.g., NASDAQ, NYSE).

industry.description: The specific industry classification of the company (e.g., Semiconductors, Banks).

peer_group.description: A group of similar companies used for performance comparison.

region.description: Geographical region where the company operates or is based.

sector.description: Broad market sector (e.g., Technology, Healthcare, Finance).

eq_fields.description: Fields related to basic equity information like exchange, industry, peer group, region, and sector.

eodprice.description: The official closing price of the stock for the trading day.

fiftytwowkpercentchange.description: Percentage change of stock price over the last 52 weeks.

intradaymarketcap.description: Real-time estimated total market value of the company's shares.

intradaypricechange.description: Change in price since last close during the current trading day.

lastclose52weekhigh.lasttwelvemonths.description: Highest closing price in the past 52 weeks.

lastclose52weeklow.lasttwelvemonths.description: Lowest closing price in the past 52 weeks.

lastclosemarketcap.lasttwelvemonths.description: Market capitalization based on last closing price.

percentchange.description: Percentage change in stock price since previous close.

price.description: Fields related to stock price metrics including intraday and end-of-day prices, market capitalization, and price changes.

avgdailyvol3m.description: Average number of shares traded daily over the last 3 months.

beta.description: Volatility relative to the overall market (1 = same volatility as market).

dayvolume.description: Total shares traded so far today.

eodvolume.description: Total number of shares traded by market close.

pctheldinsider.description: Percentage of shares held by company insiders.

pctheldinst.description: Percentage of shares held by institutions.

trading.description: Fields related to trading activity including volume, beta, and ownership percentages.

days_to_cover_short.value.description: Number of days needed for short sellers to cover their positions at average volume.

short_interest.value.description: Total number of shares currently sold short.

short_interest_percentage_change.value.description: Percentage change in short interest compared to previous period.

short_percentage_of_float.value.description: Percentage of the tradable float that is shorted.

short_percentage_of_shares_outstanding.v.description: Percentage of all available shares that are shorted.

short_interest.description: Fields related to short interest metrics including days to cover, total short interest, and percentages of float and shares outstanding that are shorted.

bookvalueshare.lasttwelvemonths.description: Company's book value divided by number of shares.

lastclosemarketcaptotalrevenue.lasttwelv.description: Valuation ratio of market cap to total revenue.

lastclosepriceearnings.lasttwelvemonths.description: Price-to-earnings ratio using last close price.

lastclosepricetangiblebookvalue.lasttwel.description: Price relative to tangible book value.

lastclosetevtotalrevenue.lasttwelvemonth.description: Enterprise value relative to total revenue.

pegratio_5y.description: Price-to-earnings growth ratio based on 5-year estimates.

peratio.lasttwelvemonths.description: Price-to-earnings ratio based on trailing 12 months.

pricebookratio.quarterly.description: Stock price relative to book value per share.

valuation.description: Fields related to valuation metrics including P/E ratios, price-to-book ratios, and enterprise value ratios.

consecutive_years_of_dividend_growth_cou.description: Number of consecutive years the company has increased dividends.

forward_dividend_per_share.description: Projected dividend per share for the upcoming year.

forward_dividend_yield.description: Dividend yield based on expected future dividends.

returnontotalcapital.lasttwelvemonths.description: Return generated on all invested capital.

profitability.description: Fields related to profitability metrics including return on assets, return on equity, and dividend information.

ltdebtequity.lasttwelvemonths.description: Ratio of long-term debt to shareholder equity.

netdebtebitda.lasttwelvemonths.description: Company’s EBITDA relative to net debt load.

totaldebtebitda.lasttwelvemonths.description: Company’s EBITDA relative to total debt.

totaldebtequity.lasttwelvemonths.description: Total debt relative to shareholder equity.

leverage.description: Fields related to leverage metrics including debt ratios and interest coverage.

currentratio.lasttwelvemonths.description: Ability to pay short-term liabilities with short-term assets.

operatingcashflowtocurrentliabilities.la.description: Cash flow coverage of short-term liabilities.

quickratio.lasttwelvemonths.description: Liquid assets relative to current liabilities.

liquidity.description: Fields related to liquidity metrics including current ratio, quick ratio, and cash flow coverage.

ebitda.lasttwelvemonths.description: Earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation, and amortization.

ebitdamargin.lasttwelvemonths.description: EBITDA as a percentage of revenue.

grossprofit.lasttwelvemonths.description: Revenue minus cost of goods sold.

grossprofitmargin.lasttwelvemonths.description: Gross profit as a percentage of revenue.

netincomemargin.lasttwelvemonths.description: Net income as a percentage of revenue.

totalrevenues.lasttwelvemonths.description: Total income from sales and operations.

income_statement.description: Fields related to income statement metrics including EBIT, EBITDA, profit margins, and revenue.

totalcashandshortterminvestments.lasttwe.description: Highly liquid assets on the balance sheet.

totalcurrentassets.lasttwelvemonths.description: Assets that can be converted to cash within 12 months.

balance_sheet.description: Fields related to balance sheet metrics including total assets, liabilities, and cash holdings.

cashfromoperations.lasttwelvemonths.description: Cash generated from core business activities.

leveredfreecashflow.lasttwelvemonths.description: Cash available after paying interest and obligations.

unleveredfreecashflow.lasttwelvemonths.description: Cash available before paying interest (company-level free cash).

cash_flow.description: Fields related to cash flow metrics including cash from operations and free cash flow.

esg_score.description: Overall ESG risk and performance score.

governance_score.description: Measures company transparency, ethics, and governance.

social_score.description: Measures labor practices and social responsibility.

esg.description: Fields related to ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance) scores and controversy levels.
